TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to add Counter Measure Details.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on add button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on add button .
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on add button .

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter counter measure name.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter counter measure name.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter counter measure name.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select applicable area.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select applicable area.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select applicable area.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter estimation construction cost.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter estimation construction cost.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter estimation construction cost.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select impacted crash severity.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select impacted crash severity.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select impacted crash severity.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select unit of measure.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select unit of measure.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select unit of measure.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select counter measure category.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select counter measure category.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select counter measure category.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter known maintenance cost.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter known maintenance cost.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter known maintenance cost.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select applicable control type.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select applicable control type.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select applicable control type.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter treatment lifetime.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter treatment lifetime.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter treatment lifetime.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select applicable treatment type.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select applicable treatment type.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select applicable treatment type.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter estimated effectivness.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter estimated effectivness.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter estimated effectivness.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select source.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select source.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select source.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is click on save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on save button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify toast message.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify toast message.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify toast message.
